publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3680 Colin Boyd QC: Salmon and Freshwater Fisheries (Consolidation) (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the law which is restated in the Salmon and Freshwater Fisheries (Consolidation) (Scotland) Bill should be restated. Supported by: Mrs Elish Angiolini*
